title: 72/151. Enlargement of the Executive Committee of the Programme of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees

paragraphs.1: Decides to increase the number of members of the Executive Committee of the Programme of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees from 101 States to 102 States;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Economic and Social Council to elect the additional member at a coordination and management meeting in 2018.
